title: Свадьба по-русски! с америкашкой Дэни
overview: A wedding reality show in which Russian-American actor Daniel Barnes, known as American Dani, will watch and comment on the celebrations. He is well acquainted with American canons, and now he will immerse himself in Russian traditions. The host will evaluate the outfits of the bride and groom, the decoration of the hall, the music, the dishes and the general atmosphere. He will also dispel stereotypes, play games from the toastmaster and learn holiday terminology.
